Aki

Korean: 아키

Hometown:

Kamphaeng Phet

Country:

Thailand

Full name:
Torngern Thongngiu
Native name:
ต่อเงิน ทองงิ้ว
Birthday:
Dec 29, 2006
Age:
18 years old
Blood type:
B

Introduction

Aki is a Thai trainee and former pre-debut member of Thai boy group A Ten. He was a contestant on the 2024 survival show MAKE MATE 1 but was eliminated in episode 6 after ranking 34th.

Current state:
inactive 
Active years:
2023-2024
